title: Given x(t), where is v increasing?

content.question: A particle moves along a straight line. The graph of the particleâ€™s position x(t) at time t is shown above for 0 < x <6. The graph has horizontal tangents at t = 1 and t = 5 and a point of inflection at t = 2. For what values of t is the velocity of the particle increasing?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
